mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, URI, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_ORDER, USE_STATE FROM MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (#{item}) ORDER BY PARENT_MENU_ID ASC, DISPLAY_ORDER ASC, MENU_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU( PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, URI, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_ORDER, USE_STATE, REG_USER_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DATE )VALUES( #{parentMenuId}, #{menuName}, #{uri}, #{description}, #{displayOrder}, #{useState}, #{regUserId}, NOW(), #{modUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MENU
MENU_NAME = #{menuName},
DESCRIPTION = #{description},
DISPLAY_ORDER = #{displayOrder},
USE_STATE = #{useState},
MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId}, MOD_DATE = NOW()
WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
